title: pH+
long_description: pH+Â helps to raise the pH of pool water to maximize the efficiency of sanitizers and prevent the corrosion of surfaces. Maintaining a balanced pH will increase swimmer comfort and protect pool equipment.
short_description: BENEFITS Helps balance pH of water to maximize sanitizer efficiency Increases swimmer comfort FORMATS 2 kg, 8 kg and 25 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: pH of pool water should be between 7.2 and 7.8. Total alkalinity of pool water should be between 80 and 120 ppm. Levels are determined with a testing kit.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Slowly sprinkle pH+ onto the surface of the water while walking all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add pH+ according to the application method and the recommended dosage. Wait 20 minutes before entering the pool after adding the product. Let water circulate for 4 hours after adding the product. Then check pH and do a second treatment if needed.
